hotspot.title: Instructions
hotspot.description:
How to follow. How to lead. How to jump. How to come back.
Following: someone else will direct your view. Ready: You will lead if you move. Leading: Everyone else is following your moves.
If you should jump to a foreign VR, look up for the return hotspot directly above you, or turn to directly behind you.

hotspot.title: Image Popup
hotspot.description: Thhis space for rent, contact Roberta at repeatingshadow@yahoo.com

hotspot.title: There might be Kliingons
hotspot.description:
When you jump (teleport) to an outside virtual space a return node is added. If you can look straight up, the return node will be here.
Otherwise, it will be directly behind you when you first jump in.
So, always when you teleport, look up, and look behind.
There might, after all, be Klingons..

Soon to be open.

hotspot.title: Directions
hotspot.description:
Follow Ready Lead and How to come back.
This is a shared experience virtual web-ring. When there are more than one viewer on the site, a consensus view is arrived at, and your view will follow that.
You can take the lead yourself, if the group stops moving.
A web-ring is a community of connected links. Members of this ring will provide at least one link to another member of the ring, though typicaly three: for next, previous, and random member.
This starting ring has links to non-member vr as well. The shared consensal view still operates on the exteral vr, though! You can lead the group to your favorite vr, and vist the sites together.
If you should jump to a foreign VR, look up for the return hotspot directly above you, or turn to look directly behind you, the return jump should be there.

polyhotspot.title: rawgnet script
polyhotspot.description: A virtual reality web ring. From this one ring, leap out to other worlds.
